name: claude-code-safety-net (kenryu42)
description: [项目级] A Claude Code plugin that acts as a safety net, catching destructive git and filesystem commands before they execute.。来源: https://github.com/kenryu42/claude-code-safety-net

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: Claude Code offers [native sandboxing](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/sandboxing) that provides OS-level filesystem and network isolation. Here's how it compares to Safety Net:

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
AGENTS.md
CLAUDE.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
LICENSE
README.md

assets/cc-safety-net.schema.json
ast-grep
ast-grep/rule-tests
ast-grep/rules
ast-grep/utils
biome.json
bun.lock
bunfig.toml
codecov.yml
commands
commands/set-custom-rules.md
commands/set-statusline.md
commands/verify-custom-rules.md
dist

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
npx cc-safety-net explain "rm -rf /"
npx cc-safety-net explain --json "git checkout -- file.txt"
npx cc-safety-net explain --cwd /tmp "git status"

name: claude-code-safety-net/commands 模块
description: [模块级] claude-code-safety-net 项目的 commands 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/kenryu42/claude-code-safety-net

genes.title: commands 模块说明
genes.content:
| Command Pattern | Why It's Dangerous |
|-----------------|-------------------|
| git checkout -- files | Discards uncommitted changes permanently |
| git checkout \<ref\> -- \<path\> | Overwrites working tree with ref version |
| git restore files | Discards uncommitted changes |
| git restore --worktree | Explicitly discards working tree changes |
| git reset --hard | Destroys all uncommitted changes |
| git reset --merge | Can lose uncommitted changes |
| git clean -f | Removes untracked fil
